page.title: 07I.C.I. WORKS CLITHEROE
page.content: The factory at Clitheroe is part of the Agricultural Division of I.C.I. It covers approximately fifteen acres and employs about 160 people, of these 100 work on a four shift system which works round the clock fifty two weeks of the year. The remaining 60 people are on days working on maintenance, service and management purposes. Some interesting facts :_ 1. The boiler chimney stack is 120 feet high. 2. Last year it used 8477 MwH of electricity. (This would keep 967 single bar electric fires alight night and day for a year.) 3. Last year it used 1.8 million therms of gas. (This would keep 1800 houses centrally heated for a year.) 4. Last year it used 49.5 million gallons of water. (This would fill the local swimming pool 540 times.)
